attributes.action: Encourage Dundee City Council to provide facilities for fans to watch Scotland's biggest match in 10 years!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scotland's crucial Euro 2008 qualifier against Italy later this month will be shown on big screens at a party on Glasgow Green. 
Tickets for the "Tartan Party" on 17 November go on sale on Saturday and cost £12. 

As well as the game being shown, there will be entertainment and a beer garden, plus guest appearances from former Scotland players.

Dundee City council have decided not to provide anything.

Sign this petition if you think Dundee Council should provide a similar event!

Show your support for the National Team and the Scottish sun's "Big Party"!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
